structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.text: Any sewer construction district created in the manner provided in KRS 76.300 to 76.325 is exempt from the provisions of KRS 76.085, subsections (2) and (3), except when said sewer construction district empties its effluent into mains or plants operated by metropolitan sewer district.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 1, effective June 16, 1960.
